capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-documented fact. As someone who's had the... pleasure of dealing with him on multiple occasions, I can confirm that his loyalty to the school and its values has been unwavering, despite his often prickly demeanor.

Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a bit complicated, to be honest. I mean, he was the Potions master for many years and seemed to have a certain... respect for the school, but at the same time, his behavior towards students was often quite intimidating and unfair. He had a very dark past, you know, and that's something that still affects him even after all these years.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a bit complicated, to be honest. I mean, he was the Potions master for many years and had a significant impact on the students' education. But at the same time, his behavior towards Harry Potter and other students was often quite... intimidating. He seemed to have a personal vendetta against Harry, which made it difficult for me to sympathize with him. Overall, I think Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a bit of a mixed bag - he was a complex character who left a lasting impression on the school.
